document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the Myopa testacea Species-Group in the Palaearctic Region (Diptera: Conopidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the Myopa testacea Species-Group in the Palaearctic Region (Diptera: Conopidae)

subSubSection.paragraph: Locus typicus : “Europa australis, Ascanius” (the last element may refer to the collector or collection – see Clements et al . in prep.).

Type material
: A single specimen stands under this name in the Linnaean collection held at BMNH (Box 23 ): 1 Ψ, labelled ( 1 ) “ testacea ex deper” and “ferruginea”, label verso “ 4 ”. [Specimen examined by DKC in
September 1995
].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Lectotypus
1 Ψ: ( 1 ) “Roretz / 1876 / Japan ”; ( 2 ) “ Typus ” [red label]; ( 3 ) “ Myopa stigma [sic!] / var. japonica Krb. / O. Kröber det. 1914 ”; ( 4 ) “ Lectotypus /
Myopa testacea
/
var. japonica
Kröber, 1916
/ des.
Stuke 2002
” [red label]. [The lectotype is in good condition, and is deposited at NHMW , where it was examined by JHS in 2002 ].

Paralectotype
: A syntype , which according to the original description is most probably a Ψ, is also held at NHMW (Contreras-Lichtenberg in litt. 2002 ), but was not examined for the present study.

Literature :
Stuke ( 2003 a)
: Lectotype designation, photograph of the lectotype , taxonomic discussion.
